name: Lakbay
description:
Lakbay is a game where players will be playing as Lakan, a demigod who guides and helps the people and fights evil entities. Players must strengthen the arsenal of the demigod to go through the challenging hordes of enemies. The game features story mode where the player traverses throughout the stages, defeating the different enemies Sitan summoned to stop Lakan, from saving Mayumi. LAKBAY also has an endless mode where the players will battle endless waves of monsters with higher difficulty.

 This game is still in development and is open to additional mechanics, ideas, and more!

For now, the game is available only for Mobile Android.
